---


## [Installation](#)

- **PIP**

      pip install bigquery-orm

- **Poetry**

      poetry add bigquery-orm

## [Uninstallation](#)

- **PIP**

      pip uninstall bigquery-orm

- **Poetry**

      poetry remove bigquery-orm
